Redefining Contemporary Art

Learn About Our Work

  • NIAD is a progressive art studio for adult artists with developmental disabilities

NIAD On View

All the Exhibitions

It was amazing to see my art in an actual gallery, to see something I created in a place thats new. It feels good for other people to see it.

NIAD artist Samantha Kershnar

Shop NIAD Artwork

All the Art

When youown a piece of NIAD art, you connect with the unique story of an artist with disabilities, amplify an original voice in contemporary art, and empower an artist to earn income from their work.

Become a NIAD Artist

Learn More
  • How to Join NIAD

    Being an artist at NIAD gives me the experience of finding, when I didnt know what kind of art I had inside.

    I had this talent for so long that I didnt know I had.

    NIAD brought it out.

    NIAD artist Dorian Reid

How You Can Support

More Ways to Give

Your gift of time or moneyor bothis what keeps us going strong.

  • Donate

    Support NIAD artists as they build sustainable creative practices and a more inclusive art world for everyone.

    Support Our Work
    Support Our Work
  • Volunteer

    Become a crucial part of the NIAD community by volunteering your time in the studios, galleries, at events, and behind-the-scenes.

    Get Involved

NIAD rests on the unceded lands of the Ohlone, Miwok, Muwekma, and Confederated Villages of Lisjan.
NIAD is a registered 501(c)3. EIN: 94-2837552
